subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin scored three goals for his seventh career hat trick, and second of the season, to lead Washington over visiting Ottawa, 7-4. Ovechkin scored his goals in the first two periods with Sergei Fedorov assisting on each.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin scored three goals for his seventh career hat trick, and second of the season, to lead Washington over visiting Ottawa, 7-4. Ovechkin scored his goals in the first two periods with Sergei Fedorov assisting on each.
